welcome_message_body: Welcome to Manizales, the charming city nestled in the Colombian Andes known for its stunning landscapes and rich coffee culture. We invite you to explore our vibrant streets, immerse yourself in the local traditions, and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!
